+ Swatch Media started as a graphics and web design company keen on offering professional online presence. We + resorted to also provide offline presence. Our main focus is Branding, Marketing and Business Consultancy. Our team is filled with + passion and we pursue every project with the relevant expertise. + We work with both companies and individuals particularly start ups who strive to build and expose their brand. + We are a highly driven, creative and result oriented team with the ability to prioritize and set directon in a + fast-paced environment. + Our goal is to capture the needs and wants of the very fast growing economy inorder to realise the + expectations of our current and future clients. +

+ Previous Projects: +

+

+
+ +
+
+ +
+

Brand Design

+

HEB ENTERPRISES

+

Our team did a complete rebrand of this organisation. From the logo, colors, typography and photography + to all other related visual assets

+

+

+ +
+

+

Graphics

+

BRYSHI SERVICES LIMITED

+

Our team went all in on this project. This client wanted a logo that would speak for itself and we + delivered. It is what we do best. Bold and precise

+

+

+
+
+
+ +
+
+ +
+

Web Design

+

AQILA SOFTWARE LIMITED

+

We did a complete brand development project with Aqila. A highly technical client but we delivered a + masterpiece in every aspect we worked on.

UI/UX Design

+

A rebrand episode giving it a new and fresh look. The engagements increased with an upgrade in the user experience and an increase in functionalities.

UI Design

+

+

SWATCH MEDIA

HOME PORTFOLIO SERVICES CONTACT US

IT STARTED WITH GRAPHICS

BRANDING AS A PASSION

PORTFOLIO

Previous Works


Swatch Media started as a graphics and web design company keen on offering professional online presence. We resorted to also provide offline presence. Our main focus is Branding, Marketing and Business Consultancy. Our team is filled with passion and we pursue every project with the relevant expertise. We work with both companies and individuals particularly start ups who strive to build and expose their brand. We are a highly driven, creative and result oriented team with the ability to prioritize and set directon in a fast-paced environment. Our goal is to capture the needs and wants of the very fast growing economy inorder to realise the expectations of our current and future clients.

Previous Projects:

Brand Design

HEB ENTERPRISES

Our team did a complete rebrand of this organisation. From the logo, colors, typography and photography to all other related visual assets

Graphics

BRYSHI SERVICES LIMITED

Our team went all in on this project. This client wanted a logo that would speak for itself and we delivered. It is what we do best. Bold and precise

Web Design

AQILA SOFTWARE LIMITED

We did a complete brand development project with Aqila. A highly technical client but we delivered a masterpiece in every aspect we worked on.

UI/UX Design

MBIUFUN GAMING

A rebrand episode giving it a new and fresh look. The engagements increased with an upgrade in the user experience and an increase in functionalities.

UI Design

ETHOS MOBIILE WALLET

A wallet project that required a lot of research to implement the design but our over-qualified team hacked it. Incorporated next generation designs.

Web Design

ATHENE RESEARCH GROUP

Utilising the existing theme, the Athene Research website is modelled to display in detail its origin and its purpose while maintaining a rich look.

Contact Us
